get.description: This API lists a particular number of activities related to a contact, based on the limit specified.

schema.description: Additional information related to the activity. Values allowed are: contacts, assignee,tickets,teams,projects,integInfo.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Key that sorts the activities by a specific attribute: @activityTime@ or @createdTime@.The default sorting order is ascending. A @-@ prefix denotes descending order of sorting.

schema.description: Key that sorts the activities by a specific attribute: @activityTime@ or @createdTime@.The default sorting order is ascending. A @-@ prefix denotes descending order of sorting.

get.description: This API lists a particular number of activities related to an account, based on the limit specified.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort by a specific attribute: @activityTime@ or @createdTime@.The default sorting order is ascending. A @-@ prefix denotes descending order of sorting.

schema.description: Sort by a specific attribute: @activityTime@ or @createdTime@.The default sorting order is ascending. A @-@ prefix denotes descending order of sorting.

post.description: This API deletes all spam activities.

get.description: This API lists a particular number of activities associated with a ticket, based on the limit specified.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort by a specific attribute: @activityTime@ or @createdTime@.The default sorting order is ascending. A @-@ prefix denotes descending order of sorting.

schema.description: Sort by a specific attribute: @activityTime@ or @createdTime@.The default sorting order is ascending. A @-@ prefix denotes descending order of sorting.

departmentId.name: departmentId
departmentId.description: ID of the department from which the activities must be fetched

schema.description: ID of the department from which the activities must be fetched

from.name: from
from.description: Index number, starting from which the activities must be fetched

schema.description: Index number, starting from which the activities must be fetched

isSpam.name: isSpam
isSpam.description: Key that denotes whether to fetch spam activities or not

schema.description: Key that denotes whether to fetch spam activities or not

isCompleted.name: isCompleted
isCompleted.description: Key that denotes whether the activity is completed or not

schema.description: Key that denotes whether the activity is completed or not

departmentId.description: ID of the department to which the activities belong
